item.title: Transform Source System Tables to Minimize Data Model Tables
item.description: In the last past of previous post Utilize N-M relationship between Activity and Dimension Tables, I said just mimicing source system’s table structure to data model is not useful for Celonis data model. Also I feel loading time to data model is exponentially long when one more table is added. So minimizing data model table is good practice especially for real time analytics. In case of SAP Order to Cash (O2C) scenario, case table is sales order item (VBAP).
